attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We understand that the Government has already taken measures to prevent this behaviour, however we feel more is needed. There should be a real threat to the comfort of these people. They commit these offences upon these vulnerable people because they have no fear of punishment for their crimes and anti-social behaviour. A more severe impact on those who are proven to have committed an offenseis required. Therefore a hefty "on the spot" fine might be in order, or a prison sentence.

reasons: Language which is offensive, intemperate, or provocative
